title: Ore No Oshi ? Kamisamadesu
alternative_title: My Bias Is A God!? ; Ore no Oshi wa 'Kamisama' desu!? ; 俺の推しは’神様’です！？ ; 俺の推しは“神様”です!?
status: My Bias Is A God!? ; Ore no Oshi wa 'Kamisama' desu!? ; 俺の推しは’神様’です！？ ; 俺の推しは“神様”です!?
description:
Description :
        Mamori, a die-hard idol fan, would do anything for his beloved Kamui, the lead singer of the popular male idol group "Gods." When a chance for Mamori to see his idol live and up close at a concert seems to fall from the heavens, he can't believe his luck. Everything seems like a dream come true, until Kamui looks directly into his eyes... and calls him his "ceremonial vessel"!!
In a world where heavenly beings walk the earth, Mamori learns that his bias is quite literally a god in human form... and he wants Mamori to bear him a child!
So begins their divinely-ordered cohabitation, but can Mamori really accept that the person he idolized is a god? Was everything Mamori thought he knew about Kamui true, or has his love been built on a lie?
